visual.name: bulletChartByOKViz
visual.description: Inspired by Stephen Few, the Bullet Chart by OKVIZ allows you to show data values, saving precious space on your reports. It can render single or multiple values in a series and show comparison values, different targets, and performance areas. Horizontal and vertical mode included.

numberLocale.description: Set the number formatting for what concerns thousands separators and decimal separators.

locale.description: Set the culture code in the format languageCode-countryCode.

maxRows.description: Choose how many rows the visual can retrieve from the data set. Note that retrieving more than 30,000 rows may slow down the entire report. Set '0' to retrieve all the data.

autoSize.description: Automatically enlarge the axis to display the entire text.

percentile.description: Size reserved for category axis. Set 0 to automatically calculate the best size according the content of the axis. ✦ This feature is available with premium license only.

rotation.description: ✦ This feature is available with premium license only.

separator.description: A string to use for joining labels of a hierarchy.

reverseLabels.description: Reverses the order in which the labels of a hierarchy are joined.

baseline.description: ✦ This feature is available with premium license only.

fillGridlines.description: ✦ This feature is available with premium license only.

strokeGridlines.description: ✦ This feature is available with premium license only.

styleGridlines.description: ✦ This feature is available with premium license only.

lineCap.description: ✦ This feature is available with premium license only.

lineDensity.description: ✦ This feature is available with premium license only.

positionGridlines.description: ✦ This feature is available with premium license only.

position.description: ✦ This feature is available with premium license only.

center.description: Center the label to both variance and value bars.

changeValueType.description: ✦ This feature is available with premium license only.

showChange.description: Display the change over the choosen measure.

background.description: ✦ This feature is available with premium license only.

border.description: ✦ This feature is available with premium license only.

bulletShape.description: This section is available with premium license only.

advancedRules.description: Define advanced color rules to change the color of the bullet(s). To open the color rules manager, click the Edit button that appears on the hover chart. ✦ This feature is available with premium license only.

share.description: Share targets among measures. If enabled, measures are checked against every target. If disabled, each measure is checked only agaist the target in the same position.

targetLabels.description: ✦ This feature is available with premium license only.

labelsOption.description: ✦ This feature is available with premium license only.

order.description: Defines the order of display priority for label types.

overlap.description: Allows to show overlapping labels. The order of overlapping is defined by the 'Priority' option.

overflow.description: Always keep labels visible regardless of the size of the bars.

variances.description: This section is available with premium license only.

percentile.description: Variance bar size compared to actual bar.

alignment.description: Variance bar alignment compared to actual bar.

share.description: Share first target variance among measures. If enabled, measures are checked against the first target variance. If disabled, each measure is checked only agaist the target variance in the same position.

opacity.description: ✦ This feature is available with premium license only.

autoSort.description: If active, all states are visible, regardless the order given by the user.

additionalStates.description: Allows to add more than 5 fields in states. ✦ This feature is available with premium license only.

hide.description: Disable the Advanced Editor button that appears in the right corner of the visual. When disabled, you can still access the editor's advanced features by clicking the 'Edit' item in the menu from the visual header.

diagnostics.description: Log significant information and errors in the script console of the browser. This could affect the performance of your report.

screenReaderLabel.description: Show tooltips on data labels that are user-friendly for screen readers, instead of using the typical Power BI tooltips.

arrowKeys.description: Enable navigation between elements of the same type with the arrow keys.
